turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Shelby's Raid (1863).
turn.1: What happened during the final days of Shelby's Raid?
turn.2: On the 31st, Shelby moved to McKissick's Springs, waiting until Colonel D.C. Hunter joined him with 200 men recently recruited from Missouri and Arkansas.
turn.3: What happened after they joined up with 200 men?
turn.4: Crossing into Missouri near Pineville on October 2.
turn.5: What did they do in Missouri?
turn.6: There, Shelby was joined by Colonel J.T. Coffee with 400 men.
turn.7: Did they capture any more men?
turn.8: At Neosho, Shelby captured the garrison of 300 troops, whom he then paroled.
turn.9: What happened after they captured the garrison of men?
turn.10: On the 6th, they passed through Humansville, camped 10 miles from Warsaw, captured 30 government wagons and picked up prisoners, as well as many horses.
turn.11: What happened after they captured the government wagons?
turn.12: On the 7th they reached Warsaw, where they captured the fort with arms, prisoners and provisions.
